metadata.title: CVE-2020-20891 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
Buffer Overflow vulnerability in function config_input inlibavfilter/vf_gblur.c in Ffmpeg 4.2.1, allows attackers to cause a Denialof Service or other unspecified impacts.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-20891` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

ffmpeg - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavcodec-extra - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavcodec-extra59 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavcodec59 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavdevice59 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavfilter-extra - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavfilter-extra8 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavfilter8 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavformat-extra - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavformat-extra59 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavformat59 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libavutil57 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libpostproc56 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libswresample4 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
libswscale6 - 7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: ffmpeg package in mantic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '7:4.4.1-3ubuntu2').
qtwebengine-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
vice package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
